quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Dungeons and Game
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, opportunity, rogue. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which Knowledge Skill would allow you to determine the type of Giant you are facing in Dungeons and Dragons?
Which of these feats does not prevent attacks of opportunity in one form or another in the role-playing game Dungeons and Dragons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Flyby Attack

questions.question: In the game Dungeons and Dragons, Aamonks Ki Strike ability evolves in what order?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Magic, Lawful, Adamantine

questions.question: In Dungeons and Dragons, the Tumble Difficulty Class needed to kip up, according the Complete Adventurer book, is what?

The core of this gaming console, released in 1977, was combined with a display and sound chip known as the TIA, for Television Interface Adaptor.  The console was capable of producing 2 channel mono sound.
In the game Dungeons and Dragons, a character with 5 ranks in Bluff gains a +2 synergy bonus to all these skills but one. Which is the odd one?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gather Information

questions.question: Shigeru Miyamoto constructed the arcade game Donkey Kongs music himself, using an Electronic Keyboard.
Which of the listed bonuses in the game Dungeons and Dragons stacks?
How many heart pieces can you get as adult Link in the game The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time?
Of the choices for a Rangers favored enemy in Dungeons and Dragons, which number is immune to sneak attacks?
Which class in Dungeons and Dragons does not get evasion?
Which of these is not a correct entrance requirement to join the Assassin Prestige Class in Dungeons and Dragons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Disguise 8 ranks

questions.question: The sound chip of the Commodore 64 home computer, released in 1982, was very advanced for its time.  It had three channels with several different waveforms, which could reach 8 different octaves each (approximately 16 - 4000 Hz).  Name the chip.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sound Interface Device

questions.question: My rogue in the game Dungeons and Dragons wants to use a wand of Greater Invisibility. In order to do this he must make a Use Magic Device check at what Difficulty Class?
How many golden skulltulas could you get as child Link out of the whole game The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time?

quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, d, world. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

In World of Warcraft, it is sometimes necessary to fight other groups of players inside an instance.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Metal

questions.question: Tom Morello is a member of the band Sonic Youth.

In the video game The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time, what are the two places where you can get the hylian shield?

options.text: Kakariko Graveyard and Hyrule town market.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kakariko Graveyard and Hyrule town market.

questions.question: In the video game The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time, Link wore tunics in three colors. They were green, red and yellow.
What is the Iron Maiden song performed in Guitar Hero 3?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Number of the Beast

Which of the following races cannot play a Hunter in World of Warcraft?
Which of the following is NOT a character class in World of Warcraft?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Way and Nintendo
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, blitzball, pokemon. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the way to evolve a Yanma into a Yanmega in the Diamond and Pearl Pokemon series for Nintendo DS?

options.text: At level 33 let Yanma learn rollout.
At level 33 let Yanma learn silver wind.
At level 33 let Yanma learn anchient power.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: At level 33 let Yanma learn anchient power.

questions.question: How do you evolve Rhydon into Rhyperior in the Diamond and Pearl Pokemon series?

options.text: Trade Rhydon up while holding a hard stone.
Trade Rhydon up while holding a protector.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Trade Rhydon up while holding a protector.

questions.question: At what location does the PS2 role-playing game Final Fantasy X start?
Which of these is the correct way to evolve a Kirlia into a Gallade in Pokemon Diamond and Pearl?

options.text: Use a dawn stone on Kirlia.
Use a dawn stone on a female Kirlia.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these

questions.question: In Pokemon Diamond and Pearl, in what way do you evolve a Porygon2 into a Porygon-Z?

options.text: Give it an upgrade and trade it.
Give it a tech disc and trade it.
Give it a dubious disc and trade it.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Give it a dubious disc and trade it.

questions.question: In what way can you evolve the pokemon Snorunt into a Frosslass in the Diamond and Pearl Pokemon series for Nintendo DS?

options.text: Use a dawn stone on a male Snorunt.
Use a shiny stone on a male Snorunt.
Use a dawn stone on a female Snorunt.
Use a shiny stone on a females Snorunt.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Use a dawn stone on a female Snorunt.

questions.question: How do you evolve an Electabuzz into an Electrivire in the Diamond and Pearl Pokemon series?

options.text: Trade it while holding a electrizer.
Train it while holding a electrizer.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Trade it while holding a electrizer.

questions.question: Which other team member do you meet first in the PS2 game Final Fantasy X?
What is the way to evolve the pokemon Tangela to tangrowth in the Diamond and Pearl Pokemon series?

options.text: Level it up after learning ancient power.
Trade it while holding a growth incense.
Use a leaf stone on it.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Level it up after learning ancient power.

questions.question: In Final Fantasy X, where does Yuna perform her first Sending?
How do you evolve a Dusclops into a Duskinoir in Pokemon Diamond and Pearl?

options.text: Trade a Dusclops that is holding a reapers cloth.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Trade a Dusclops that is holding a reapers cloth.

questions.question: In Final Fantasy X, when you enter the Farplane in Guadosalam to talk to Yunas father, Auron stays behind because he is scared of confronting Jecht.
In what way can you evolve the pokemon Gilgar into Gliscor in the Diamond and Pearl Pokemon series for Nintendo DS?

options.text: Trade it holding a razor fang.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these

questions.question: Which of these is not a blitzball team from the PS2 game Final Fantasy X?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ronso Rovers

questions.question: What is the first place you get a gig at on Guitar Hero 3?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Backyard Bash

options.text: In the Sea of Sorrows inside Sin

options.text: Life is a game of blitzball

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The dreams that have faded

questions.question: Can you take control of your staff members in the Thrillville video game strategy?
Is it true that in Legend of Zelda and the Wind Waker, after you beat the game you can make a new file and not get Links green clothing?
In the simulation and strategy Thrillville, what is the best way to increase your attraction meter?

options.text: A challenge the person to a mini-game off

questions.question: In Final Fantasy X, where do you get each of the following aeons respectively: Ifrit, Shiva, Yojimbo, Valefor, Magus Sisters, Ixion?

options.text: Djose, Requiem, Besaid, Macalania, Calm Lands, Kilika
Kilika, Macalania, Calm Lands, Besaid, Requiem, Djose
Macalania, Kilika, Calm Lands, Gagazet, Requiem, Djose.
Kilika, Djose, Calm Lands, Requiem, Besiad, Macalania

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kilika, Macalania, Calm Lands, Besaid, Requiem, Djose

questions.question: What does Sarias Song do in Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time?

options.text: Teleports you to the Hyrule Castle
Enables you to talk to Saria

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Enables you to talk to Saria
